Method Detail

create

public static ArrayBuffer create(int length)
Constructs a new ArrayBuffer instance. The newly created ArrayBuffer has the given length in bytes. The ArrayBuffer is initialized with 0 values.

Parameters:
length - the byte length of the newly created ArrayBuffer
Returns:
the created ArrayBuffer

getByteLength

public final int getByteLength()
Returns the non changeable length of the ArrayBuffer in bytes.

Returns:
the non changeable length of the ArrayBuffer in bytes.
